entities.name: Included Files List
entities.content:
Path | Function/Description |
-----|-----------|
`/common/page.txt` | Basic page settings |
`/common/taglib.txt` | Tag library declarations |
`/common/doctype.txt` | DOCTYPE declarations |
`/common/meta.txt` | Meta tags/SEO |
`/contract/script.txt` | Contract module common JavaScript |
`/contract/style.txt` | Contract module common CSS |
`/contract/ukeoi/keiyakuNewtmp/kihon/body.jsp` | Main screen body |

---

entities.name: Modal Dialogs
entities.content:
| File/URL | Function |
|----------|------|
| `/dsmart/contract/ukeoi/keiyakuNewtmp/keiriRegisterKakuninFrame.jsp` | Accounting registration confirmation |
| `/dsmart/contract/ukeoi/keiyakuNewtmp/keiriNoSet.jsp` | Accounting number settings |
| `/dsmart/contract/keiyakusyoKagamiPrint.jsp` | Contract mirror print |
| `/dsmart/contract/keiyakusyoHanshaKagamiPrint.jsp` | Contract reflection mirror print |

---

entities.name: Block Overview (Screen Components)
entities.content:
| Block | Path (if any) | Function/Content | |-------|----------------|-----------| | EH003_1 | `/contract/blockList/refer/EH003_1.jsp` | Error message display | | JH02 | `/contract/blockList/refer/JH02.jsp` | Header card (Contract basic information) | | JH03 | `/contract/blockList/register/JH03.jsp` | Contract basic information | | JH13_1 | `/contract/blockList/register/JH13_1.jsp` | Function buttons (Print, DFC card, etc.) | | J0001_2 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0001_2.jsp` | Contractor information (Contractor) | | J0002 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0002.jsp` | Builder information (Building owner) | | J0003 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0003.jsp` | Land owner information (Land owner) | | J0004 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0004.jsp` | Construction information (Construction/Land information) | | B0001 | `/contract/blockList/register/B0001.jsp` | Date information & Contract amount | | J0087 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0087.jsp` | JTI information (Residence/Land purchase applicant) | | J0084 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0084.jsp`
`/contract/blockList/refer/J0084.jsp` | Business status (Business entity) | | J0088 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0088.jsp` | After-sales information (After-service) | | J0092 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0092.jsp` | Technical staff assignment (Technical staff assignment) | | Cancel/Update | `/contract/cancelUpdateButton.txt` | Cancel/Update buttons at the end of the form | ---

entities.name: Form Hidden Fields
entities.content:
- `printCheckSuccessFlg` − Print check success flag
- `printHanshaCheckSuccessFlg` − Reflection print check success flag
- `seigouseiCheckSuccessFlg` − Consistency check success flag
- `keiriNorRegistFlg` − Accounting number registration flag
- `keiriNoSetIsDoneFlg` − Accounting number setting completion flag
- `printDfcGokeiyakusyaCardSuccessFlg` − DFC customer card printing success flag
- `aftDfcUrlFlg` − After DFC URL flag
- `printKeiyakuInsatsuSuccessFlg` − Contract printing success flag
- `keiyakusyoYoushikiCd` − Contract form code
- `keiyakusyoYoushikiCdHikae` − Contract form code copy

entities.name: Contractor Information (J0001) Hidden Fields
entities.content:
- `J0001_hUniqueId` − Contractor unique ID for editing
- `J0001_hKokyakuTodoufuken` − Prefecture (hidden)
- `J0001_hKokyakuShikutyouson` − City/Ward/Town/Village (hidden)
- `J0001_hKokyakuOaza` − District (hidden)
- `J0001_hKokyakuTyoume` − Block number (hidden)
- `J0001_hKokyakuBanchi` − House number (hidden)
- `J0001_hKokyakuBuilMansionName` − Building/Apartment name (hidden)
- `J0001_hSyufukuKbn` − Primary/Secondary classification (hidden)
- `J0001_hKokyakuNo` − Customer number (hidden)

entities.name: Construction Information (J0004) Hidden Fields
entities.content:
- `J0004_hJyukyoTodoufuken` − Residence prefecture (hidden)
- `J0004_hJyukyoShikutyouson` − Residence city/ward/town/village (hidden)
- `J0004_hJyukyoOaza` − Residence district (hidden)
- `J0004_hJyukyoTyoumoku` − Residence block number (hidden)
- `J0004_hChibanTodoufuken` − Land registry prefecture (hidden)
- `J0004_hChibanShikutyouson` − Land registry city/ward/town/village (hidden)
- `J0004_hChibanOaza` − Land registry district (hidden)
- `J0004_hChibanTyoumoku` − Land registry block number (hidden)
- `J0004_hTochiNo` − Land number (hidden)
- `J0004_hHanbaiBukkenNo` − Property sale number (hidden)

---
